segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's about to lose his balance any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be encouraging him, her eyes fixed on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they think their mother won't notice what they're doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is just pouring onto the floor, and she's standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't understand how she hasn't felt the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen looks like it's about to flood, and she's just drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is one of those moments where everything seems to go wrong at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting a warning, but I know they can't hear me.
segments.speaker: PAR
